title: (x) Savannah Cheerleading script - (similar to) Palette (customised) {Mike Y}
content:
This is one that I had to redraw once, but now they want the same font for about twenty different groups of cheerleaders, if anyone can ID the font, itâ€™ll be smooth sailing!  
Thanks in advance!!!

| --- | --- |
| [CHEER SAVANNAH PRINTOUT.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116104413/http:/typophile.com/files/CHEER%20SAVANNAH%20PRINTOUT.jpg) | 60.66 KB |
author: Castleman

comments.content:
I think this is [Palette](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116104413/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/palette-bq/) that has been connected. Use the test drive to see how the letters are the same shapes.

- Mike Yanega
